title: My ladies looking glasse VVherein may be discerned a wise man from a foole, a good woman from a bad: and the true resemblance of vice, masked vnder the vizard of vertue. By Barnabe Rich Gentleman, seruant to the Kings most excellent Maiestie.
author: Rich, Barnabe, 1540?-1617.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed [by John Legat] for Thomas Adams,
